name: a2a-mcp
description: MCP server that bridges to A2A servers via the A2A client

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: mkdir -p dist/esm && echo '{"type": "module"}' > dist/esm/package.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:cjs: mkdir -p dist/cjs && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json
